pr_title: Enable support embedded heap bounds for JITServer

timeline.message:
Enable support embedded heap bounds for JITServer

Issue: #10950

Signed-off-by: Harry Yu <harryyu1994@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: TR_J9SharedCacheServerVM should continue to return false much like the TR_J9SharedCacheVM does
timeline.author: mpirvu

replies.bodyText: I did not remove the override to false for TR_J9SharedCacheServerVM.
replies.author: harryyu1994

replies.bodyText: Ok. I didn't expect the implementation for TR_J9SharedCacheServerVM to exist because it should have used the one from TR_J9ServerVM which it derives from.
replies.author: mpirvu
